desc: Tack of the town is Las Vegas' premier specialty equestrian and tack store. Offering the top brands like Samshield, Fabbri, Parlanti, Mane Jane, Winston, Ariat, Equifit, Incrediwear and many more.

layout.text: Introduced for the first time on the Equestrian market, Kask’s patented Fit System allows for the helmet to perfectly and automatically fit on the riders head by gently cradling the back.

Riding is a passionate sport but also a dangerous sport, at a high level as well as in leisure. The Airbag vest is an innovation that protects the rider's vital areas. But for an airbag to be effective, it must first be worn.
